code: export var UPDATE_DESCRIPTION='UPDATE_DESCRIPTION';export var UPDATE_DESCRIPTION_SUCCESS='UPDATE_DESCRIPTION_SUCCESS';export var UPDATE_DESCRIPTION_FAIL='UPDATE_DESCRIPTION_FAIL';export var UPDATE_DESCRIPTION_RESET='UPDATE_DESCRIPTION_RESET';export var updateDescription=function updateDescription(params){return{type:UPDATE_DESCRIPTION,params:params};};export var updateDescriptionSuccess=function updateDescriptionSuccess(response){return{type:UPDATE_DESCRIPTION_SUCCESS,response:response};};export var updateDescriptionFail=function updateDescriptionFail(response){return{type:UPDATE_DESCRIPTION_FAIL,response:response};};export var updateDescriptionReset=function updateDescriptionReset(){return{type:UPDATE_DESCRIPTION_RESET};};
